name: Nifty League
summary:
Nifty League is a blockchain-based, arcade-style collection of games.

Nifty League isn't just any gaming league, we're a group of hardcore competitive gaming degenerates set out to disrupt an entire industry.
Our community members own their characters (by way of non-fungible tokens/NFTs), get to earn $NFTL token by playing (play to earn, renting characters, etc), have a say in the direction of the entire project as its set to be fully community governed and decentralized, and a whole slew of other perks & benefits.
